name: WorldFamousPainting
description:
This is our first GameJam game! Kind of broken but fun! I contributed to this game as one of the programmers(小H if you find it in the staff page). Believe it or not, we actually won the first place in the Shanghai division of CiGA Game Jam 2018! 

Use QADPLJ and Space to move the character. The game only has 3 short level on current stage. 2 Players is preferred. Cooperate with your friend and help the prince and princess escape from the curse!

PS: The hand will stick to the ground if you press Q or P while the hand is touching the ground. So you can kind of rotate the whole body around it. Sorry for not mentioning that in the tutorial page.

PPS: You may find the model stuck into the ground, which is an unsolved bug. Please press the restart button on the upper left.
